author: cnbc.com
title: HealthTrust Workforce Solutions’ Brendan Courtney Honored on 2018 Staffing Industry Analysts “Staffing 100” List
text:
NASHVILLE, Tenn.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- HealthTrust Workforce Solutions is pleased to announce that Brendan Courtney, president and chief executive officer, has been named among the most influential leaders in the staffing industry by Staffing Industry Analysts (SIA). This marks the third consecutive year Courtney has been named to the North American Staffing 100 List. Staffing 100 honorees represent the most influential leaders in the workforce solutions ecosystem, including human cloud firms, VMS, MSP and RPO providers, as well as niche segments.
This press release features multimedia. View the full release here: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180305005160/en/
Brendan Courtney (Photo: Business Wire)
Staffing Industry Analysts ranked HealthTrust Workforce Solutions as the eighth-largest US healthcare staffing firm and among the largest travel nurse, per diem nursing and allied healthcare staffing agencies. HealthTrust Workforce Solutions is also a Managed Services Provider with more than $1 billion in MSP spend. Under Courtney’s leadership, the company has had four consecutive years of double-digit growth.
“I am honored and humbled to once again be recognized by the Staffing Industry Analysts as an influential leader,” said Brendan Courtney. “It has been truly incredible to be a part of the significant contributions our industry has been making on the world of work over the past three decades. I am grateful to have the opportunity to further enhance HealthTrust’s organizational commitment to operational and clinical excellence as the industry’s leading healthcare staffing managed services provider.”
HealthTrust Workforce Solutions changed its name in 2016 from Parallon Workforce Solutions. Click here to view Brendan Courtney’s Staffing 100 profile.
About HealthTrust Workforce Solutions
HealthTrust Workforce Solutions , an affiliate of HealthTrust, delivers proven workforce strategies at hospitals and healthcare facilities nationwide--aimed at improving employee satisfaction, patient satisfaction and workforce efficiencies. It is a trusted advisor on enterprise-wide workforce strategies and assessments; the nation’s largest provider of healthcare managed staffing program solutions; the seventh largest provider of clinical and non-clinical healthcare staffing and recruiting services; and an innovator in educational services designed to bridge the nursing shortage gap. With first-priority access to more than 200,000 jobs at the nation’s leading hospitals, HealthTrust Workforce Solutions empowers thousands of clinicians each year to deliver exceptional patient experiences.
About HealthTrust
HealthTrust (Healthtrust Purchasing Group, L.P.) is committed to strengthening provider performance and clinical excellence through an aligned membership model and the delivery of total spend management advisory solutions that leverage its operator experience, scale and innovation. Headquartered in Nashville, Tennessee, HealthTrust ( www.healthtrustpg.com ) serves over 1,500 hospitals and health systems, and more than 31,000 other member locations including ambulatory surgery centers, physician practices, long-term care and alternate care sites. On Twitter @HealthTrustpg .
